definitions.definition: A man married to an unfaithful wife, especially when he is unaware or unaccepting of the fact.
A West Indian plectognath fish, Rhinesomus triqueter.
The scrawled cowfish, Acanthostracion quadricornis and allied species.
To make a cuckold or cuckquean of someone by being unfaithful, or by seducing their partner or spouse.
